reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in Bldg. M, Unit 8, for a week this month and loved every minute. Although the condo is not facing the beach, it is within a very short walking distance and is very close to the pool and deck. Our unit was meticulously clean, very nicely furnished, and well equipped. The bed and sheets were very comfortable - we slept like babies! I would recommend this unit to anyone who wants to enjoy Sanibel Arms West and the island of Sanibel.
reviews.title: Loved our Condo!
Serene Stay in Sanibel
reviews.text: Stayed at Sanibel Arms West condos for 7 nights in early December 2008. We stayed in unit D1, an oceanfront condo on the ground floor. The condos are excellent: very well maintained, clean, exceptionally large, and true to the photos on the Web site. We had a washer/dryer in the unit, too, which was ideal as we were traveling with family and that meant we could pack lightly. The decor is typical Floridian: pastels, sea shells, and wicker. Not our fave decor, but perfect for the setting.

The condos include full-sized kitchens, and ours was stocked with every type of cooking pot, pan, utensil, and appliance you could possibly want. We actually ate many of our meals at the condo because we loved sitting at the dining room table and watching and hearing the ocean. (There is only 1 restaurant on all of Sanibel with water views, and that's Gramma Dots, which is part of Sanibel Marina. Best seafood - specifically grouper - on the island, by the way.)
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.text: When you arrive, your condo is stocked with a "starter pack" of stuff: paper towels, toilet paper, dish soap, etc. Once you run out, it's your responsibility to restock. Also, there is no daily maid service. You are also responsible for any cleaning while you're there. Our unit had a vacuum, brooms, and cleaning supplies. This was not an issue, but it's good to know, as this information is not clear on their Web site. There are community trash bins (dumped several times a day), as well as community recycling bins throughout the property, so keeping up with your trash and recyclables is easy.
reviews.title: Loved Sanibel Arms West!

likes.disliked: — I really can't think of anything!

reviews.text: As others have mentioned, it's best to stock up on groceries on the mainland and then once you're there, Jerry's is the island supermarket. Although you do pay a price for having your supermarket just down the street, Jerry's is a wonderful grocery store that is stocked with fresh foods and everything you could possibly want. It has a deli, a restaurant, fresh produce, fresh seafood monger, etc.
reviews.title: Paradise!
Sanibel Arms West Condos, top notch experience
reviews.text: We have been staying at Sanibel Arms West for last approx. 8 years. Never before have I submitted a review on anything, but our experience says we should do so.

Great value. The condos are well maintained not only inside but even the outdoor grounds. Mgmt. is on site and Steve Snyder and staff are accommodating, helpful, and don't make mistakes. The screened in outdoor pool is wonderful. Bikes are on site and in good condition. It seems like each year they add amenities. This year there was a new lounge room at the pool with free computers for the guests as well as improved laundry facility and outdoor gas grills.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
Call Sanibel Arms West Directly
reviews.text: After having previously stayed at a couple other places we contacted the Sanibel chamber of commerce for suggestions and they indicated that Sanibel Arms West was among the best values on the island. and were they ever right.

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.text: Whereas some of the places are only Saturday to Saturday, I have found Steve to attempt to be accomodating to my in and out needs when possible. One example of their service comes to mind on this last trip. We inquired about a cruise from Captiva, and Jenni not only explained the cruise but then called for us and booked our cruise instead of just handing me their phone number.
We plan to return to Sanibel Arms West again next year and suggest you also give them a try.
reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.text: We just returned from a vacation on Sanibel (6/14-6/21). This was our second time here and the second time we used Sanibel Arms West. I can't say enough about how great the property and office staff are!! Our first trip last year was for a romantic getaway. We liked it so much we brought back our young daughters, mother, and grandmother this time. Most condos (ours was C7) sleep 6 comfortably. There are also two full baths and a washer/dryer in the unit which are also great features We took advantage of the fully furnished kitchen and ate all our meals in. With 4 adults sharing the load and having a dishwasher it really didn't seem like work at all. Besides, we had an ocean front unit that had a view you couldn't get from any restaurant on the island. If you decided to book C7 and want a general idea of what the kitchen has just send me a message through Trip Advisor. While I can't imagine not having the ocean view, none of the units are far from the water. They also have bike rentals and a screened in pool that we really enjoyed. This complex is also very close to shopping and dining. You will never go wrong if you stay here no matter what unit you choose!! Contact the complex directly for the best rates and flexible stay options. We will always have a home away from home on Sanibel in Sanibel Arms West.
reviews.title: Best spot to stay on Sanibel!!!

reviews.text: Great stay in a great condo, D5 was our unit, nicely kept up, great to be oceanfront. Two complaints from reading past reviews, they do not supply bikes, you must rent them. Also, the beach chairs provided are pretty bad, bring your own if you are picky. Other than this, the place was great, nicely kept up, kids loved it. Had a smoker below us who did not heed the no-smoking signs in their lanai, but I didn't complain. You will enjoy your stay here, great complex...
reviews.title: Great Choice on Sanibel

reviews.text: Recently stayed, with husband and two children, at Sanibel Arms West Condos (B2).
reviews.title: LOVED Sanibel Arms West!

likes.liked: — Clean, moderately priced and GREAT location

reviews.title: Great Family Vacation Place
reviews.text: Best place on the island. Moderately priced; beautiful, clean condo (2 bed., 2 bath)
Everything we needed was there; bikes, beach chairs, pool, GREAT beach.
reviews.title: Slow Times on Sanibel

reviews.text: I would definitely agree with the other reviewers - this condo complex is a real find. We had unit B5, which faced the driveway but had a small view of the gulf. All of the furnishings were up to date, and the appliances actually seemed to be new. If you are looking for a quiet unit, be sure to ask for one away from the pool area.
reviews.title: Clean, spacious, and right on the beach

reviews.text: As the previous poster said, wifi and cell service was spotty, but Steve, the manager, mentioned that he is in the process of upgrading the wifi. Steve was extremely accommodating, as he allowed us to rent for just 3 nights.
reviews.title: Wonderful condos right on the beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Sanibel Arms West aims to please!

reviews.text: We stayed in unit H3 which is a 2 bedroom / 2 bath condo on the first floor. The apartment was very clean and, although the decor was a bit dated (early 1990s), everything looked nice and the kitchen was well equipped. Having washer and dryer in the unit was a plus. The screen porch was really nice and, although this units faces the parking lot, it is only steps from the beach which was absolutely wonderful! Common use grounds and gardens were clean and well kept. The only down side was the wireless internet connection and cell phone reception within the apartment which were unreliable. I can't wait to go back to Sanibel and will definitely stay at Sanibel Arms West again.
reviews.title: Great Place, Very nice to deal with!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As I write this I'm spending my last night at Sanibel Arms West(I don't want to go home and back to work!) and we had a wonderful, relaxing time here. I won't forget the beautiful view of the Gulf from the oversized lanai and the very clean and well-landscaped grounds here. The staff, from Steve to the nice ladies in the office, were first class all the way. You'd never know these buildings were built over 30 years ago because they are kept in great shape and are super clean. We felt right at home here and would definitely return again. Thank you for a peaceful week in paradise!
reviews.title: Felt like home the minute we got there
